title.rendered: Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received the visit of Arc. Ahmed Musa Dangiwa.

content.rendered:
The Honourable Minister of Foreign Affairs, Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received the visit of the Honourable Minister of Housing & Urban Development of Nigeria, Arc. Ahmed Musa Dangiwa, who led a delegation of Shelter Afrique (ShafDB) to the Ministry on Thursday, 22nd February, 2024.

ShafDB is a Pan-African Institution dedicated to financing and promoting urban housing and related infrastructure development. Headquartered in Nairobi, with office in Nigeria, ShafDB is focused on driving Africa’s growth and development through funding of affordable urban housing, infrastructural development, and job creation, among others.

ShafDB recently introduced its Innovative Affordable Housing Credit Guarantee Programme in Nigeria. H.E. Arc. Ahmed Musa Dangiwa is the current Chairman of Shelter Afrique AGM Bureau.
The delegation was in the Ministry to deliberate and strengthen collaboration in identified areas of interest.
